scripts.angular-blank: npm run create-angular-blank && npm run lh-angular-blank
scripts.angular-tabs: npm run create-angular-tabs && npm run lh-angular-tabs
scripts.create-angular-blank: rm -rf angular/blank && ionic start angular/blank blank --type=angular && cd angular-blank && npx ng build --prod
scripts.create-angular-tabs: rm -rf angular/tabs && ionic start angular/tabs tabs --type=angular && cd angular-tabs && npx ng build --prod
